name: Bioside
description:
Bioside is a university VR project developed by 19 NHTV students and was developed within a timeframe of 8 weeks. The main goal was to create innovative movement in virtual reality, while merging elements of the shooter genre. Therefore, the team took inspiration from other VR games like Lone Echo and Robo Recall, to create unique and interesting movement, while still delivering action-packed combat.

Known Issues

Loading Issue
At the moment it is a possibility that upon loading into the level you will not be able to play because tracking isn't working. To work around this:
- press the tilde key (`) to open the development menu
- Type and Enter "Open LVL_SplashScreen" or "Open LVL_FinalWeek"

Bugs
- The weapon wheel isn't working properly.
- The Friendly Drone at the start might misdirect you, having you follow the tutorial in the wrong order.
- The Stalker enemy doesn't behave properly
